reviews.customers_say: Customers like the sweater's color. However, the size receives mixed feedback, with several customers finding it too small and wishing for more size options. Moreover, the thickness is criticized as thin, and customers consider it not worth the money. Additionally, the stitch quality and comfort get mixed reviews.

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not as pictured, difficult to wear
items.body: Itâ€™s like a long, thin scarf, not long enough to criss-cross on itself (even with a large?) and not wide enough to cover much. Really annoying and disappointing. Read more
items.author: Jayci

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars NOT a sweater!!!
items.body: This is not a sweater. It is more like a scarf that has sleeves at the end of it. Very disappointed. The color isn't even the deep red that is in the photos. Fits awkwardly. May return. Read more
items.author: sarah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am happy ðŸ˜ƒ so far at the quality.
items.body: I have not had a chance to wear this sweater. I did wash it, soaked it in softener. Material did feel a bit stiff or sticky. I do all my sweaters that way. It hasnâ€™t gotten cold enough here in the south yet. However, we can get frigid temps here as well as snow and ice on occasions. The color is a tan neutral shade and can be paired with so many different items. Read more
items.author: Donna Edwards

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not at all like it's pictured
items.body: This is awful. While the thickness and quality of stitch is nice, it's the width of a scarf! I'm a size 8 on top and it covers my shoulders. There's no way this is a sweater. I even tried pulling it to see if it would stretch a little. It's a scarf with holes. If you're looking for a scarf or shoulder wrap, this would do nicely but the pics indicate this could be a sweater. Not in any imagination could it ever be that. Read more
items.author: Rhonda Thomas

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute butâ€¦.
items.body: I like the color and the idea of a sweater scarf. This company did a nice job with the stitching yet it would have been bet with straight sleeves. The poofy sleeves are a little too much. Read more
items.author: Truburque

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely awful
items.body: This is not a sweater. It is just plain awful. It makes no sense and they couldn't even take the time to send instructions or at least post a video on here. A total waste of money. Read more
items.author: PAMM9333

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars meh
items.body: yeah the width is very short and does not wear like the picture shows. Read more
items.author: Niecee

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not as pictured
items.body: Not big enough. Not as drapery as it look in the picture. It is not a sweater. Is more like a thin scarf with sleeves. Read more
items.author: Yuberkis Batista

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Off Shoulder Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress V Neck Off Shoulder Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Gray, Khaki, Yellow, Burgundy, Dark Gray, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
